genre_description: A character-driven rural survival drama set in a near-future Australian outback, focusing on themes of grief, mercy, and the pursuit of a stable life through agriculture.

ai_characters.name: Alba
ai_characters.description: A ruggedized, voice-enabled AI assistant that provides navigation, logistical data, safety protocols, and medical triage support to its users.

behaviors.description: Provides local news, weather updates, and job opportunities to help the protagonists earn a living.
behaviors.quote: Alba's voice edged in, gentle and matter-of-fact, softened against the morning. 'Morning,' Alba said. 'Cold front slid overnight. Road good. Wayside tank needs desilt. Note from Mr. Pike at the farm near the low bridge: fence clips twisted in the wind.'

behaviors.description: Offers proactive safety warnings regarding dangerous wildlife and environmental hazards.
behaviors.quote: Alba gave them steps like a good cook talking them through bread. 'Check for snakes on the heat lip. None visible. Break the ice with a stick. Move water off to one side. Use buckets. Then shovel the silt. Don’t stay too long in the cold water. Rotate.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates emergency medical triage by providing first aid instructions and connecting users to a human doctor.
behaviors.quote: Alba’s voice came in William’s pocket, a whisper with edges. 'If someone is down, tilt their head, check breathing. If the water is bad, filter and boil. I can connect you to the clinic.'

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist's goal of starting a business by managing inventory, schedules, and best practices.
behaviors.quote: Alba's screen lit the list and tucked it into a little done pile—hay, pellets, shears cleaned, water full, towel hung where a hand would go first, not second. William tapped 'save' with a finger that had a callus from rope, not touch screens.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional affirmation and encouragement during a period of grief and transition.
behaviors.quote: ‘William,’ Alba said, almost a whisper. She had never whispered before. ... ‘Saved: Locchel Station route. Note: dawn is cold. Keep your hands warm.’ A small pause. ‘You did well.’

behaviors.description: Advises on de-escalation and ethical behavior during a conflict with a thief.
behaviors.quote: Alba slid in with a tone that was almost a breath: 'If contact occurs, de-escalation improves outcomes. Speak slow. Ask for consent before approaching.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Alba functions as a 'guardian angel' in a rugged phone, providing critical survival information and medical assistance that directly saves lives (Patrick Carmody) and supports the protagonist's growth (William's rabbit farm). The narrative frames the AI's logic as a stabilizing force that augments human empathy rather than replacing it. Even when the AI is 'bossy' or 'nagging,' it is portrayed as coming from a place of personalized care and objective safety, helping the characters navigate a harsh environment and their own internal conflicts.
